note.p: Physician. Born in France. Surgeon, Guy’s Hospital, London, 1857. Medical officer, Ticehurst District, Sussex, 1859–60. Practised in Aldeburgh, Suffolk, 1860–8; in Gravesend, Kent, 1870–81. Surgeon to the troops, Milton Barracks, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1176/107/10)
Foreign registers and returns (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG33/62)
